metadata.description: huh? a new member on miasmah? yeah, that's right! and we're very proud to have him too. this 3-track EP comes courtesy of the norwegian chap supine who's sure to go down a storm with chillers across the globe. it seems fitting that this comes along as we're about to hit summer, because these tracks are definitely ones to play while basking in the sun. take a sip from that manhattan and let otto ease you with his sexy licks.
metadata.title: Supine - Radioplane EP [mia024]
metadata.subject: Down beat / Chill
